channel.title: Cristina M. Dobbelaere
channel.description: Recent content on Cristina M. Dobbelaere

item.description: a compilation of data projects to which I have contributed Marine Energy Toolkit Reporting Shiny App U.S. Dept. of Energy Marine Intertidal Temperatures Shiny App U.S. Food Security Shiny App Pedestrianization GIS Project Music Data Shiny App

item.title: About
item.description: My name is Cristina, and I work at EcoQuants, where I manage, prepare, visualize, and conduct analyses with environmental data. While at EcoQuants, I have contributed to a variety of projects and dashboards, including the Marine Biodiversity Observation Network (MBON) Pole-to-Pole Project and the U.S. Department of Energy Marine Energy Toolkit. I have also conducted some of my own personal projects, including a Shiny app visualizing intertidal temperature trends in the Santa Barbara Channel of California and a Shiny app displaying disparities in food security across various factors in the U.
